description: WuInstall is a command line tool that makes it possible to install Windows Updates on demand. This package runs wuInstall with the following parameters: "wuInstall /install /logfile_append c:\wuinstall.log /disable_ie_firstruncustomize /disableprompt /reboot_if_needed /autoaccepteula /rebootcycle 3". You can pass your parameters to the wuInstall by specifying them in installer arguments (for example: -ia "/search /reboot_if_needed").
summary: WuInstall is a command line tool that makes it possible to install Windows Updates on demand.
author: kireevco
